TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 定义可选的协定，绑定通过实现该协定，可以指定传入请求是由服务同步处理还是异步处理。

span.span: Defines the optional contract that a binding can implement to specify whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously by the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在某些情况下，绑定使用同步 或 方法处理消息可能更加有效。In some cases it may be more efficient for a binding to process messages with the synchronous or methods. 类可以选择实现 ，从而指示调用方这是优先选择。A class can optionally implement to indicate to callers that this is preferred. 如果绑定不实现 ，则 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] Service Model Runtime 层默认使用异步版本的 `Receive` 和 `Request` 方法。If a binding does not implement , the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer defaults to using the asynchronous versions of the `Receive` and `Request` methods. 如果绑定实现 ，则 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Service Model Runtime 层会检查 的值，并使用该值来确定是调用这些方法的同步版本（ 或 ）还是异步版本（ 和 或 和 ）。If a binding does implement , the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer checks the value of and uses that to determine whether to call the synchronous versions of the these methods ( or ) or the asynchronous versions ( and or and . 如果绑定实现 并从 `true` 属性返回 ，则建议使用同步的 和 方法从通道接收消息。If is implemented by the binding and returns `true` from the property, it is recommended that you use the synchronous and methods to receive messages from the channel. 如果绑定不实现 ，或从 `false` 属性返回 ，则建议使用异步的 和 或 和 方法。If the binding does not implement or returns `false` from the property, it is recommended that you use the asynchronous and or and methods. 无论 属性返回什么值，所有绑定仍然必须为所实现的特定通道类型提供 `Receive` 方法同步版本和异步版本的有效实现。Regardless of the value returned by the property, all bindings must still provide valid implementations of both the synchronous and asynchronous versions of the `Receive` methods for the specific channel types implemented. 有关实现自定义通道的详细信息，请参阅[开发通道](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/developing-channels.md)。For more information about implementing custom channels, see [Developing Channels](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/developing-channels.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示实现 接口的绑定是如何实现的。The following example shows the implementation of a binding that implements the interface. 此代码摘自[分块通道](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/chunking-channel.md)示例：This code is taken from the [Chunking Channel](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/chunking-channel.md) sample: [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChunkingChannel#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_chunkingchannel/cs/tcpchunkingbinding.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReceiveSynchronously As Boolean
public: property bool ReceiveSynchronously { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示传入请求是由同步处理更加有效还是异步处理更加有效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.

value.span: 如果可以更有效地同步进行; 处理请求否则为。

span.span: if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 ，即异步处理请求。

span.span: The default is , to handle requests asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 提供的标准（系统提供的）绑定已实现此接口，并在某些情况下会重写默认值，以便同步处理传入消息。The standard (system-provided) bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] have implemented this interface and in some cases override the default value to process incoming messages synchronously. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChunkingChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_chunkingchannel/cs/tcpchunkingbinding.cs#1)]
